name: [OHKE]
description:
Game 1 for the Annual Variety Megajam #3.

Step 1: Hold the button to record a word.

Step 2: Listen to the word played backwards.

Step 3: Record a mimic of the backwards sound.

Step 4: Listen to THAT backwards.

Step 5: Score yourself and your friends on the result.

PS. Chrome may block microphone use for security reasons.
